Diploma in Hospitality & Tourism

COURSE DURATION:

  • 1 Year

 

ADMISSION REQUIREMENTS:

  • You must have passed Grade 12 or an equivalent.
  • You must have completed the CTH Certificate in Hospitality and Tourism Management, or have been granted an exemption from this.
  • You must be able to speak, read and write English.

 

COURSE STRUCTURE:

  • Ten  Modules must be completed
  • Each Module has a 2.5 hour exam written locally, set and moderated by the CTH in the UK.

 

COURSE CONTENT:

  • Module One: The Tourism Industry
  • Module Two: Business Operations in Hospitality & Tourism
  • Module Three: Finance for Hospitality & Tourism
  • Module Four: Marketing in Hospitality and Tourism
  • Module Five: Travel Geography
  • Module Six: Travel Agency & Tour Guide Operations
  • Module Seven: Business Computing for Hospitality and Tourism

 

ELECTIVES EITHER:

Travel Management                      |         Tourism Management        |       Casino Management

Module Eight: Fares & Ticketing 1  |             Destination Analysis                          Casino Operations

Module Nine: Fares & Ticketing 2   |             Tourism Economics                            Casino Management

Module Ten: GDS Systems                 |        Special Interest Tourism                      Responsible Gambling

 

CAREER PATH:

Secure a training position at a relevant employee as a:

  • Travel Agent;
  • Travel Guide;
  • Hotel Sales Executive;
  • Head Porter;
  • Head Waiter;
  • Head Receptionist;
  • General Assistant;
  • Food & Beverage Assistant;
  • Booking Manager;
  • Events Assistant;
  • Housekeeping Assistant Manager

 

PROGRESS OPPORTUNITIES:

Progress to the second stages of our Advanced Diploma or Pro-Graduate Diploma Courses or gain access to the second year of one of the following Universities for a degree:

 

OTHER MANAGEMENT PROGRAMMES IN HOSPITALITY AND TOURISM.

  • Certificate in Hospitality & Tourism
  • Diploma in Hospitality & Tourism
  • Advanced Diploma in Hospitality & Tourism
  • Pro-Graduate Diploma in Hospitality & Tourism
  • Post-Graduate Diploma in Hospitality & Tourism
